author: perezhilton
title: Leslie Jones Responds To Milo Yiannopoulos' Lost Book Deal! Quote Of The Day!
text:
"You guys are giving him too much energy. I was done the day I blocked him & got his ass banned. Been done and moved on. He has no space here!"
- Leslie Jones , responding to her Twitter bully Milo Yiannopoulos losing his book deal .
[ Image via Jeff Grossman/ WENN . ] 
Tags: celebrity feuds , leslie jones , milo yiannopoulos , quote of the day , twitter
